name: TAB Products
tag_list: records-management, filing-systems, mobile-shelving, file-folders, office-storage, document-management
overview:
TAB provides organizations with records management software, file storage hardware, supplies and services to organize, store and access paper and digital documents. TAB’s integrated file management solutions are designed to help organizations reduce the file storage space, organize files using color and bar-coding, and mitigate risk through effective records retention and destruction policies.

Products include software for records management and file labeling, filing supplies (e.g., folders and labels) and file storage hardware, primarily cabinets and shelving. The company offers services that help organizations to store archived documents offsite, develop and implement records retention and destruction policies, outsource file room management, convert paper documents to digital format, and consolidate and move files during corporate office relocations, mergers and acquisitions.

TAB is a private company with over 500 employees and a sales office in every major U.S. and Canadian city, Amsterdam, London and Sydney, Australia. TAB provides records management solutions for a diverse number of clients in a variety of industries including financial, legal, medical, pharmaceutical, government and energy.

milestones.description: TAB celebrates 10th anniversary of founding by two ex-IBM salesmen, Harry LeClaire and Si Foote, who issued TAB's first catalog and opened for business in San Francisco.

TAB designed records management systems for two New Jersey State government agencies: the Division of Gaming Enforcement of the New Jersey Department of Law and Public Safety and the Division of Taxation. To help monitor and fight corruption, TAB designed
TAB reorganized as a corporation in Delaware, and expanded its offerings by acquiring a 20 percent interest in Acctex Information Systems.
TAB Products acquires Jeter Systems Corporation of Akron, Ohio.
milestones.source_description: TAB Products Co LLC Set to Expand Mayville Workforce with Acquisition of Jeter Systems

milestones.description: TAB Products announces the United Statesâ€™ first carbon neutral file folder. The company's tabZEROfile is a 100% recycled, carbon neutral, acid free file folder, shipped in recyclable and reusable packaging.

milestones.description: TAB Products acquires AMES Safety Envelope Company of Somerville, Massachusetts.
milestones.source_description: TAB Products Co LLC Set to Grow Mayville Workforce with Acquisition of AMES.

milestones.description: TAB Products acquires the SmeadSoft division of Smead Manufacturing Company. SmeadSoft's product suite includes records management software for capturing, tracking and accessing both physical and electronic records.
